Text: Lemme tell ya...100% worth of downloading
So how does one make use of the subtitles?

ive been looking for this since it was "done"... i cant believe i Finished watched it. perfect. almost as good as the official one. i think i would put it on the same level or just a tad underneath it but i gota say i loved the story line and what a twist!
what should you watch this with? No sound and lots of glitches on MPC, regular WMP has sound but nothing but glitches on the image.
